00021 //: The Error function
00022 // erf(x) = (2/sqrt(pi)) Integral from 0 to x (exp(-t^2) dt)
00023 inline double mbl_erf(double x)
00024 { return (x<0)?-mbl_gamma_p(0.5,x*x):mbl_gamma_p(0.5,x*x); }
